info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 31 at 4:17AM MST until January 02 at 9:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures into the teen to lower 20s possible. * WHERE...Northwest Deserts, specifically Kingman northward up the Hualapai Valley and Golden Valley. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Freeze conditions would kill crops, other vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
